changeSet.author: thalabi
changeSet.sql: update instrument set ticker = ticker||'.CF' where ticker='CIG961'; update instrument set lk = ticker||'|'||currency||'|'||type;

rollback.sql: update instrument set lk = ticker||'|exchange' where type != 'CASH'; update instrument set lk = ticker||'|'||currency where type = 'CASH';
